name: actions_get-self-hosted-runner-group-for-org
description:
Gets a specific self-hosted runner group for an organization.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:org` scope to use this endpoint.

org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

runner_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

$ul: **selected_repositories_url**: Link to the selected repositories resource for this runner group. Not present unless visibility was set to `selected`
